comment: I really liked this class and thought it was pretty easy! The professor was really nice and understanding. As long as you do the work and pay attention to what is going on the class, you will do good. He also gave us extra credit and made the class interesting by talking about the presidential election which was going on at the time.

This was a synchronous online class because of the pandemic. Extremely easy class. The study guides are essentially the test, and there are very few assignments. He's a nice professor and gives students plenty of time to complete their minimal assignments. Highly recommend.
Very easygoing and mostly have quizzes and small assignments . He always responds quick to your emails!
Really good professor. His class was a breeze and doesnt make things too difficult. Highly recommend

Professor Morgan is quite possibly the best professor at KSU. He has worked in the Criminal Justice field for many years and is extremely knowledgeable. His lectures may be slightly dull at times but he works hard to make his tests easy for his students. Pay attention to his study guides and you'll do just fine!
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Morgan is one of the best professors in the Criminal Justice program! He has a wide knowledge of law and many years of experience. He works hard to make his class easy and bases tests directly off of his study guides. I had him during the COVID-19 outbreak and he made the class much easier for us with open- note tests. Take him!!

I LOVED HIM! He truly was a real gem, I took Crimes and Defenses and it was overall amazing. Not only is he super knowledgable about his field but he is amazing at teaching it. He has an example for everything, show up and pay attention you can't go wrong.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Amazing lectures

comment: Take Professor Morgan for criminal procedure. His lectures are real life stories that go with the terms and concepts he teaches you. There are 4 test and he gives study guide. Two small writing assignments on videos he shows. Takes attendance on an app! Great teacher!
Barry gives you study guides that are exactly like the test. He really just wants you to pass, hes great ! You seriously cant Possibly struggle in this class

I honestly would have had to try harder to fail this class than I did to pass. He's a bit unorganized but not to a point where it affects students in any way. He makes lots of jokes and he's precious. He wants his students to do well and in order to pass you literally just need to show up!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Not only is the easiest class i've ever taken, it was also my favorite class i've ever taken. Professor speaks to the class as if he were teaching one-on-one instead of following power points and not caring if you understand the material. He posts outlines before each test that is 100% the test and if you know, you'll get an A. 10/10 recommend!!

I wish he taught every class. Such a genuine guy. Easiest class I have ever taken. 4 tests, the study guide is the test. One assignment - which is very easy. Gives extra bonus points on test if you show up to every class. Definitely would take him again, totally recommend!!!!!!

Professor Morgan is one of those professor's that you wish you could take for every class you have. There are 4 major tests that are the only graded assignments in class. He gives you a study guide before each test that will definitely prepare you to make an A. He's entertaining with his lectures and you learn a lot of useful information.

Take Mr. Morgan for any class he teaches. He is a solicitor general and has a lot of great stories and can really relate to the material. Easy A if you study the study guides. Nice man and an entertaining class. I took him for CRJU2201 and I'm taking him again for CRJU 3315!!!!

One of the best professors I have ever had, caring man. Really breaks everything down if you need it. Very informative over everything, 4 tests that match the study guide. Show up to class and you're good to go.

I absolutely loved Mr. Morgan. The class is "easy" in the sense that he gives you everything you need on the study guide. You only have 4 tests throughout the class. He is a very entertaining and caring teacher. You can only miss 3 classes, though, so don't take this class if you like to skip. I would 100% recommend him!!

Fantastic professor. I took his Criminal Procedure class this semester, and it was a blast. He only does 4 tests and no other work, but if you pay attention, you'll be golden. He gives fabulous study guides, but you really don't need them if you show up and participate in class. Very clear, amusing, kind man with no problem breaking things down. A+
